page.title: 02Shops in Deal
page.content:
On Thursday, 23rd May 1985, Class 3 went with our teacher and some mums to count the different shops in the{main {shopping area}of Deal. We called it "shop-spotting". Some shops are closed down, but there are some new ones.
The{High Street}was once called{Lower {Street}because it was low lying. Many years ago several of the shops in the High Street and{Middle Street}had steps leading down to them. We saw a {fashion shop}which had been a theatre at one time. One group saw a man in a {hairdresser's salon}who was having a pink and green striped{punk rocker hair style.
Marke saw a lovely big mirror in an {antique shop.}It had a horse and writing on it. He thought it cost Â£1.05, but it really cost Â£105.00 !
